plot: This is a short documentary film, "Pat Kerr: Wrapped in Royalty" for the Tennessee State Museum. Pat Kerr is a renowned dress designer and an expert on antique lace, owning the most important privately held lace collection in the world.
title: Pat Kerr: Wrapped in Royalty
plot_es: This is a short documentary film, "Pat Kerr: Wrapped in Royalty" for the Tennessee State Museum. Pat Kerr is a renowned dress designer and an expert on antique lace, owning the most important privately held lace collection in the world.
